title: Bounty _BOX
author: Bounty _BOX
content: _________________________________________________________ Website          Twitter          Telegram          Whitepaper          Telegram         Medium _________________________________________________________1. Bounty campaign will be managed by  bounty_box2. All participants must join the CPAD Token 's official   Telegram group .3. All participants must join bounty_Box  Telegram group .4. Talking about the bounty in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group.Please ask your bounty-related questions in the Bounty_box Group.5. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.6. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.7. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed.8. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.Proof Of Registration Post Format:Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BSC Wallet Address: Code:Week: Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:[b]Twitter Campaign[/b]Twitter Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Retweets /Tweets Url:1. 2. 3. 4. 5. Tweet:1.2.[b]Telegram Campaign[/b]Telegram Username:Spreadsheet No:Telegram posts Url:1. 2. 3. 4. 5.Twitter _50%Telegram _25%Medium _25%WEEK LIST1 WEEK _ 26_07 _ 01_082 WEEK _ 02_08 _ 08_08Rewards:1. Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 3000 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,000 followers: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow CPAD Token  Twitter page .2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 500 followers.3. Participants have to make 2 new tweets and 3 retweets per week (maximum 1 retweet and 1 Tweet per day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 12 hours minimum.5. Participants must use : #core #corepad #cpad # BSC # bounty  Join Here Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Participants have to use CPAD name on telegram account that shouldn’t promote other projects.2. Profile picture shouldn’t promote any other project.3. Write at least 2 constructive messages on this group: https://t.me/corepad_official and 3 messages weekly in other crypto related telegram groups with a minimum of 1k members.Posts/messages must be constructive, useful, and in a way that will not be considered as spamming.4. Deleted messages will not be counted.5. Report your telegram message links weekly.6. You must wear CPAD Token avatar and text until the end of the campaign. Join Here Original article: 5 - 10 stakes, per participant in the campaign: Once every 3 days - max 2 articles per week ( 10 per campaign )● 1 comment - 1 steak (2 per day at most)(DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT)You can use social media for information:- Telegram Channel- Telegram Chat- Twitter- Medium● Content topics:1) Whitelist is open - Public presale will be live on soon on gamepad: CPAD on Medium https://medium.com/@corepadtoken2) This is first meme token which is giving 2% reward .3) Also, its very first memes token aggregator which means holders will also get reward in other memes tokens (under development)4) corepad  token holders can stake their cpad  tokens and reward will be in tokens as well its live as you can see here:5) lastly, community can create their own meme tokens and initiate presale here: Cpad on Medium : https://medium.com/@corepadtoken● “Applause” and Bookmark our Medium Press release● Write one comment every day about the project on other famous pages (2 per day at most) (DO NOT SPAM ON OFFICIAL PROJECT PAGESJoin Here  Mastersheet
